A

addCallBack(SimulatorCallBack) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Add a callback to the list of callbacks that will have their methods called in the right situations.
afterExecuteDay(Simulator.Outcome) - Method in interface com.epidemic_simulator.SimulatorCallBack
This method is called every time the Simulator finishes the simulation of a day.
It can be useful for activating a strategy every day, or for running the Simulator in another Thread, and having callbacks.

C

CameraMove - Class in com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual
A GameObject that is not drawable.
All it does is moving the camera according to the user input.

canInfect - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person has enough virus to infect other people in case they meet.
canInfectDay - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Days necessary for an infected green to turn yellow
canMove - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is allowed to move, it's true by default.
checkBounds - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.CameraMove
A flag using for checking bounds.
If it's set to true the camera will respect the coordinates bounds that were set at its declaration.
If it's set to false the camera will be able to move freely in the 2D spaces with no constraints.
checkQuarantine(Person, int) - Method in class strategies.ContactTracingLightTest

Clear output string and returns it.
This should be the correct way to get input data from a Strategy

The days since when this person was infected.

The number of the day in which this person will die.
If this person will not die it is -1 by default.

The Death rate (L).

dispose() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Unlink this Simulator from any data it has.
On certain JVM versions it can allow for faster Garbage collection.
It allows for lower RAM usages on multiple simulations, at the expenses of performances.
dispose() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Strategy
Unlink this strategy from any data it has.
On certain JVM versions it can allow for faster Garbage collection.
It allows for lower RAM usages on multiple simulations, at the expenses of performances.
doMove - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.DrawablePerson
This flag will be set from the simulatorGUI to coordinate all the movements in order to emulate the encounters of the Simulator
doneMoving(DrawablePerson) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.SimulatorGUI
This method it's called by DrawablePersons to signal to this class that they already met all their targets and that they're back to their starting position

E

EmergencyCheck() - Method in class strategies.MediumControlledLockdown
 
encounters - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Strategy
The data structure holding all the info about every encounter.
It is a HashMap that link every day number to another HashMap (used as a dictionary).
The second HashMap links every Person to a List of the Persons they met.
Example conceptual usage: encounters[12][mario] get all the encounters that mario did at the day 12.
executeDay() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Execute a day in the simulator.
This method will:
Make the people that can move, meet other people Make the disease status proceed for every one that has the disease Adjust resources according to who moved and who got cures

Find the List of people that a Person has met in the last days
findEncounters(int) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Strategy
Find the dictionary of the encounters for a single day NOTE: this is the same as doing encounters.get(dayNum), but it performs some additional error checking
forceJSpinnerCommit(Container) - Static method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Utils

G

getAlivePopulation() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Return a readOnly instance of the alive population list.
Trying to edit the list in illegal ways will result in a RuntimeException
(ex: deleting a red person so you don't need to heal them)
getBlackCount() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Gets the number of black people.
It is illegal for strategies to access this.

It is illegal for strategies to access this.

It is illegal for strategies to access this.
getInfected() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator

This includes green that have been infected.
It is illegal for strategies to access this.

(ex: deleting a red person so you don't need to heal them)

H

hasSymptoms() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person

I

immune - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is immune to the disease and can't be infected.
infect(int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
This method effectively infect this Person.
The person is infected by setting their Person.infected to true.

This method also decides the future development of the disease for this person.
It will extract a booleans based on the symptomsRate and if it's true it will decide the day on which this person will develop Person.symptoms.
infected - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is infected and its disease status will be updated everyday.
infectionRate - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
The infection rate (I).
initialResources - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
The initial resources (R).
InvalidSimulationException - Exception in com.epidemic_simulator.exceptions
This Exception can be thrown when trying to instantiate a Simulator with invalid parameters (according to the project specs).
InvalidSimulationException(String) - Constructor for exception com.epidemic_simulator.exceptions.InvalidSimulationException
Instantiates a new Invalid simulation exception.
isAlive() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
Get the Person.alive flag.
isInfected() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
Get the Person.infected flag.

J

javaNameToUserString(String) - Static method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Utils
This functions convert a method or a class name into a human readable string.
It only works with strings that do not contains special characters.
Example: animalCageBuilder - Animal cage builder

Simulator - Class in com.epidemic_simulator
The Epidemic Simulator core class, it does all the Simulation-related stuff by handling the prosecution of days, the encounters and the disease status of every Person.
Simulator(int, long, int, double, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
Create a simulator according to the parameters given.
simulator - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Strategy
The Simulator attached to this strategy, this should just be used to issue methods from the simulator.
Setting this variable to something else will not unlink this strategy from the old Simulator and it won't either link it to the new one
Simulator.Outcome - Enum in com.epidemic_simulator
Enum for the possible outcomes of a day execution.
SimulatorCallBack - Interface in com.epidemic_simulator
This interface declares the methods necessary for the Simulator to issue ecallbacks to an object.
NOTE: The Simulator only calls the methods of the SimulatorCallBacks that are registered.
NOTE: The Simulator never calls methods of a Strategy before the first red person has been found.
simulatorGUI - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.DrawablePerson
The simulatorGUI that will be called after this Person has completed their encounters.
SimulatorGUI - Class in com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual
The type Simulator gui.
SimulatorGUI(JFrame, Simulator) - Constructor for class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.SimulatorGUI
Instantiates a new Simulator GUI.
SimulatorSettings - Class in com.epidemic_simulator.gui
The Simulator Settings, it is the main JFrame of this Project's GUI.
It is able to instantiate Simulators and launch visual/textual simulators.
It can also find the Strategies available trough Reflections and altering its GUI in order to allow for dynamic constructor parameters.
SimulatorSettings() - Constructor for class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.SimulatorSettings
Instantiates a new Simulator settings.
SimulatorText - Class in com.epidemic_simulator.gui.textual

StopEpidemyOnFirstRed - Class in strategies
 
StopEpidemyOnFirstRed(Simulator) - Constructor for class strategies.StopEpidemyOnFirstRed
 
strategies - package strategies
 
Strategy - Class in com.epidemic_simulator
An object that represent a Strategy.
A Strategy works alongside with a Simulator, in a similar way of how a SimulatorCallBack would do.
The main difference between a Strategy and a SimulatorCallBack is that the Strategy methods are not called before the first red is found
The difference is only in the fact that a strategy keeps an inner log of every encounter between every person.
Strategy(Simulator) - Constructor for class com.epidemic_simulator.Strategy
Instantiates a new Strategy.
Link this Strategy to the Simulator passed as a parameter, set the Strategy.originalResources and initialize the Strategy.encounters dictionary.
Strategy.ParameterData - Annotation Type in com.epidemic_simulator
ParameterData is an Annotation used to specify the data of a numeric parameter of a Strategy.
It is used by the SimulatorSettings for building the GUI dynamically.
StrategyForbiddenAccessException - Exception in com.epidemic_simulator.exceptions
This Exception can be thrown when trying to access data that the Strategy shouldn't access at all.
It is a RuntimeException so there's no need to surround all the function calls to Simulator getters with try/catch.

This should never be thrown unless a Strategy try to do an illegal operation.
(For example accessing the number of yellows without testing them)
StrategyForbiddenAccessException(String) - Constructor for exception com.epidemic_simulator.exceptions.StrategyForbiddenAccessException
Instantiates a new Strategy forbidden access exception.
symptoms - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
If this is set to true the person is showing symptoms of the disease.
symptomsDevelopmentDay - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
The number of the day in which this person will develop symptoms.
If this person will not develop symptoms it is is -1 by default.
symptomsRate - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
The Symptoms rate (S).

T

target - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.DrawablePerson
A List of DrawablePersons that this person has to meet in this day.
testPrice - Variable in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
The test price (C).
testVirus(Person) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Simulator
This method test the virus inside a Person.
The virus will only be detected if the Person it's already at a stage at which he can infect other people.

NOTE: This method usually consume resources, but if the person to test already has Person.symptoms it will not waste resources.
TimeCheck() - Method in class strategies.MediumControlledLockdown
 
tryInfect(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.Person
This method is called every time an Person.infected person and a not infected one meets.
This method extract a boolean based on infectionRate, if it's true then it proceed to call Person.infect(int, int, int, int, int)

U

update() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.CameraMove
 
update() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.DrawablePerson
 
updateColor() - Method in class com.epidemic_simulator.gui.visual.DrawablePerson
Update the color of this DrawablePerson.
The color isn't always updated to the right color of the Person because otherwise all the colors of the DrawablePersons would change at the beginning of the day since the Simulator runs way faster than the graphical simulation.
Utils - Class in com.epidemic_simulator
Utility class for the Epidemic Simulator project.
It contains some method for extracting random numbers easily, some other for reflections and some utilities for UI.
